dancingdewdrop: Hi Srishti, I'm Anupama and am from SRI Lanka. Thank you for sharing these views. And I don't know about others but I definitely don't cringe when I watch you on your extremely funny, witty, and wonderfully enlightening videos. As a matter of fact, I found it personally encouraging that you seem to be so yourself (and encouraged by other sources as well), that I took a challenge of going with absolute no make up, not even lip balm for 30 days. It has now extended to 60 days. It's tough cz I'm not the best stereotyped version of myself when I look at myself in the mirror, but gradually I've started to like myself and accept myself for who I'm created to be. I too suffer from periodic eating disorders, sporadic anxiety attacks, and crazy seasons of fluctuating insecurity, but as a performer when I saw you, Sonia and the other girls on Buzzfeed I was extremely encouraged. People like true talent. They laugh with real wit. They sync with authentic presentations. So no, don't give up. Be yourself, and keep on being an encouragement to women like myself. Much love, God's blessings, and more power to you❤️ Love, Anu.
